page.title: 14ANNA RITCHIE SPECIAL SCHOOL
page.content: The Anna Ritchie is a Special school situated just off the West Road in Peterhead.It caters for one hundred and eleven pupils most of whom are mentally handicapped.The others generally have difficulty understand- ing the work set for them and don't fit into the main stream.The school has been open for twenty two years and is run by Mr Mutch and fourteen teach- ers.The pupils usually start the sch- ool at the age of three and most leave at sixteen to join Y.T.S. schemes alt- hough some stay on until the age of eighteen.All of the pupils get a chance to go to normal schools altho- ugh most of them go to Willowbank a special centre for adults.The facili- ties in the school include an indoor heated swimming-pool,a large gym-hall, technical and woodwork department.
